summary: When I first saw Sorex Vinius, I had no idea he is Corpulus's son, so I thought about changing his appearance a bit so that he looks younger.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#999999]Greetings, fellow Skyrim lovers! [/color]

[/size][size=3]I have made this mod to offer you an younger looking  Sorex Vinius, the son of the "Winking Skeever" (Solitude) innkeeper, Corpulus Vinius. 

[/size][b][size=4][color=#ffff00]Why?[/color]

[/size][/b][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS]In my opinion, Sorex looks as old as his dad, so I planned to change that. I seemed a bit awkward to me. I don't particularly like Sorex's personality, because he is so materialistic, but I have tried at least to make him look younger (and a bit better hehe).[/font]

[/size][size=4][color=#ffff00]What's new about this Sorex?[/color]

[/size][size=3]I have altered his facial features a little to make it seem he looks more like a young adult. I have also changed his hairstyle, because I just LOVE Apachii's hair and it looked great on him.[/size]

[size=4][color=#ffff00]What other mods have you used? I want the same look for Sorex.
[/color]
[/size][size=3]First of all, I have used the latest Skyrim update. Secondly, the Apachii hair mod is a must!!! Otherwise, it is most likely that this mod isn't going to work.
Here is a link to Apachii's mod I have used: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000112412][size=3][b][u][color=#00ff00]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full[/color][/u]
[/b][/size][/url][size=3]I have also used[/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000024200][size=3][b][u][color=#00ff00]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi - Variant - 2_0a[/color]
[/u][/b][/size][/url][size=3]Plus this[/size] [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1385][color=#00ff00][size=3][b]High Quality Eyes by Xenius[/b][/size][/color][/url]

[/u][size=4][color=#ffff00]Are there any problems with this mod I should think about?[/color]

[/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]As far as I know, you shouldn't have any problems with it. If you find any problems leave me a message or a comment on this mod. If you would like Sorex to have no beard or just a stubble, or if you have some other requests, let me know.[/size]
[/font]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Also check out:[/size]
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61247/?][u][size=4]Daughters Of Dibella[/size][/u][/url]
[size=4][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61222/?]Farkas and Vilkas Redone[/url][/u][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60469/?][u]
[/u][/url][u][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60761/?]Summon undead - Conjure Skeleton Spell[/url]
[/size][/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60433/?][color=#6fa8dc][u][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]Beautiful Onmund[/size][/font][/u][/color]
[/url][color=#d5a6bd][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68146/?][u][size=4]BLMM - Better Looking Marriageable Men
[/size][/u][/url]
[size=5]Enjoy your Sorex! ☺[/size][/color][color=#d5a6bd][size=5]
[/size][/color]

[i][size=3]jodidovahkiin[/size][/i]
author: jodidovahkiin
